title: ICE: could not fully normalize `<&Extern as Trait>::Type` on `#[inline]` function

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
Interestingly, omitting `#[inline]` makes the ICE ~melt down~ go away. ### Code ```Rust #![feature(extern_types)] #![allow(dead_code)] extern { type Extern; } trait Trait { type Type; } #[inline] fn f<'a>(_: <&'a Extern as Trait>::Type) where &'a Extern: Trait {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.58.0-nightly (b426445c6 2021-11-24) binary: rustc commit-hash: b426445c60b4faab6e96d2b866164d478680abf6 commit-date: 2021-11-24 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.58.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_traits/src/normalize_erasing_regions.rs:54:32: could not fully normalize `<&Extern as Trait>::Type` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.58.0-nightly (b426445c6 2021-11-24) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [normalize_generic_arg_after_erasing_regions] normalizing `<&Extern as Trait>::Type` #1 [mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked] elaborating drops for `f` end of query stack error: could not compile `extern_type_ice_repro` ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_traits/src/normalize_erasing_regions.rs:54:32: could not fully normalize `<&Extern as Trait>::Type` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic:: 1: std::panic::panic_any:: 2: ::bug 3: ::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::::{closure#0}, ()> 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt:: 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: ::enter::::{closure#0}> 8: )>>::call_once 9: >::with_task::, rustc_middle::ty::subst::GenericArg> 10: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<(rustc_middle::ty::subst::GenericArg, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job, rustc_middle::ty::subst::GenericArg>::{closure#3}> 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::, rustc_middle::ty::subst::GenericArg>> 12: ::normalize_generic_arg_after_erasing_regions 13: ::fold_ty 14: rustc_mir_dataflow::drop_flag_effects::on_all_children_bits::on_all_children_bits::::collect_drop_flags::{closure#0}>::{closure#0}> 15: ::run_pass 16: rustc_mir_transform::run_passes 17: rustc_mir_transform::mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked 18: >::with_task::, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal> 19: &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal>::{closure#3}> 20: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal>> 21: ::mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [normalize_generic_arg_after_erasing_regions] normalizing `<&Extern as Trait>::Type` #1 [mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked] elaborating drops for `f` #2 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `f` end of query stack error: could not compile `extern_type_ice_repro` ```
